extension_description.message: Opens the video in the active tab in Picture-in-Picture mode.

info_text.message: Works on any tab playing a video

msg_communication_error.message: Error: Could not communicate with the tab. Reason: $1

msg_unsupported_url.message: Error: This extension does not work on this page (chrome://, file://, or about:). Please try on a web page.

msg_no_video.message: Error: No video found or PiP is not supported.

msg_pip_close_error.message: Error: Could not exit PiP mode.

msg_script_injection_error.message: Error: Could not inject content script. Reason: $1
